keyInsights.insight: $1,792 spent on 196 zero-conversion search terms (97% of visible spend).
Only 23% Search Impression Share — missing 77% of eligible searches.
Top performer: "CTM - Standard Shopping - Winners (Jumpstart) - Manual" at 2.67x ROAS ($3,078 spend, $8,226 revenue).

checks.name: Conversion actions defined
checks.finding: 32 conversion actions (2x GET_DIRECTIONS, 2x ENGAGEMENT, 12x PAGE_VIEW, 4x PHONE_CALL_LEAD, 2x PURCHASE, 2x BEGIN_CHECKOUT, 2x ADD_TO_CART, 3x CONTACT, 1x UNKNOWN, 2x DEFAULT). Recording 13 conversions in 30d.

checks.name: Enhanced conversions
checks.finding: Enhanced conversions or offline import detected — recovers 5-15% of conversions lost to cookie restrictions.

checks.name: Server-side tracking
checks.finding: Server-side or offline conversion import active — bypasses ad blockers and browser restrictions.

checks.name: Conversion categories
checks.finding: 10 conversion categories: 2x GET_DIRECTIONS, 2x ENGAGEMENT, 12x PAGE_VIEW, 4x PHONE_CALL_LEAD, 2x PURCHASE, 2x BEGIN_CHECKOUT, 2x ADD_TO_CART, 3x CONTACT, 1x UNKNOWN, 2x DEFAULT.

checks.name: Micro vs macro separation
checks.finding: 0 primary actions, all macro conversions. Smart Bidding is optimizing for real business outcomes.

checks.name: No duplicate counting
checks.finding: Potential duplicates: 2x "purchase" actions; 2x "phone" actions; 6x "call" actions. Duplicates inflate counts 2-3x and cause Smart Bidding to overbid.

checks.name: GA4 linked
checks.finding: GA4 conversion actions linked — enables cross-device tracking and richer audience data.

checks.name: Tags firing
checks.finding: 32 actions recording 13 conversions in 30d. Data is flowing.

checks.name: Search term waste
checks.finding: $1,792 spent on 196 zero-conversion search terms (97% of $1,851 visible search spend). Top waste: "kitchen island" $100, "credenza" $48, "tv stand" $38, "dresser" $35, "raymour and flanigan" $30.

checks.name: Negative keyword lists
checks.finding: 2 list(s) with 147 total negatives. Add themed lists (Competitors, Job Seekers, Irrelevant) — minimum 3 for proper filtering.

checks.name: Account-level negatives
checks.finding: 147 negative keywords across 2 lists. Ensure lists are attached to all active campaigns.

checks.name: Product spend waste
checks.finding: 79.35% of top-50 product spend ($2,060 of $2,596) goes to 44 zero-conversion products. Exclude or lower bids on non-performers.

checks.name: Match type performance
checks.finding: No broad match keywords active. BROAD: $0, 0 conv. PHRASE: $0, 0 conv. EXACT: $0, 0 conv.

checks.name: Zero-conversion keywords
checks.finding: No significant zero-conversion keyword spend detected.

checks.name: Campaign naming
checks.finding: 3 naming prefix(es) across 3 campaigns. Consistent naming convention.

checks.name: Ad group structure
checks.finding: 2 ad groups across 3 campaigns (avg 1/campaign).

checks.name: Single theme ad groups
checks.finding: 1 ad groups per campaign on average. Manageable structure.

checks.name: Campaign count
checks.finding: 3 campaigns: 1 SEARCH, 1 DISPLAY, 1 SHOPPING.

checks.name: Brand campaign
checks.finding: No brand campaign. Competitors can bid on your brand name. Create one immediately — brand campaigns typically achieve 30-50x ROAS.

checks.name: PMax campaign
checks.finding: No active PMax. Consider launching with strong asset groups and audience signals.

checks.name: Search + PMax overlap
checks.finding: No concurrent Search + PMax.

checks.name: Budget allocation
checks.finding: 3 campaigns, $248/day budget, 23% Search Impression Share. Top: CTM - Standard Shopping - Winners (Jumpstart) - Manual (2.67x ROAS, $3,078).

checks.name: Budget utilization
checks.finding: $248/day budget, ~$105/day actual spend (42% utilization). Under-delivery — check targeting, bids, or Quality Score.

checks.name: Geographic targeting
checks.finding: "Presence or Interest" geo targeting active — shows ads to people merely interested in your location, not physically there. Switch to "Presence" in Settings > Locations.

checks.name: Network settings
checks.finding: Search campaigns properly isolated from Display Network.

checks.name: Quality Score
checks.finding: No QS data — keywords need impression history.

checks.name: Zero-impression keywords
checks.finding: 7902 of 8180 enabled keywords had 0 impressions in 30d. These are too restrictive, low-volume, or outranked — review and pause dead keywords.

checks.name: Keyword-to-ad relevance
checks.finding: No QS data to assess relevance.

checks.name: RSA Ad Strength
checks.finding: No RSAs found. Every search ad group needs at least 1 RSA.

checks.name: PMax performance
checks.finding: No active PMax campaigns.

checks.name: CTR vs benchmark
checks.finding: Account CTR: 0.99%. Below minimum threshold — review ad copy relevance and keyword targeting.

checks.name: Smart bidding
checks.finding: Manual CPC with 13 conversions/month. Below 15-conv threshold for Smart Bidding — use Maximize Clicks to build volume first.

checks.name: Search impression share
checks.finding: 23% Search Impression Share — missing 77% of eligible searches. Increase budget on profitable campaigns or improve QS.

checks.name: Manual CPC justification
checks.finding: 13 conversions/month with Manual CPC. Below threshold — focus on building conversion volume.

checks.name: Sitelinks
checks.finding: 56 sitelink asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Callouts
checks.finding: 102 callout asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Structured snippets
checks.finding: 4 structured_snippet asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Image extensions
checks.finding: 568 image asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Call extensions
checks.finding: 6 call asset(s) configured.

checks.name: Remarketing audiences
checks.finding: 25 remarketing/audience list(s) configured.

checks.name: Customer Match
checks.finding: 1 Customer Match list(s) uploaded.

quickWins.action: Add negatives for 10 zero-conversion search terms: "kitchen island", "credenza", "tv stand"... — $1,792 wasted.
Fix: No duplicate counting — Potential duplicates: 2x "purchase" actions; 2x "phone" actions; 6x "call" actions. Duplicates inflate counts 2-3x and cause Smart Bidding to overbid.
Fix: Product spend waste — 79.35% of top-50 product spend ($2,060 of $2,596) goes to 44 zero-conversion products. Exclude or lower bids on non-performers.
Fix: Brand campaign — No brand campaign. Competitors can bid on your brand name. Create one immediately — brand campaigns typically achieve 30-50x ROAS.
Fix: Geographic targeting — "Presence or Interest" geo targeting active — shows ads to people merely interested in your location, not physically there. Switch to "Presence" in Se
Fix: Quality Score — No QS data — keywords need impression history.
Fix: RSA Ad Strength — No RSAs found. Every search ad group needs at least 1 RSA.

items: $1,792 wasted on 196 zero-conversion search terms. Add top wasters as negatives: "kitchen island", "credenza", "tv stand", "dresser", "raymour and flanigan".
Create a brand Search campaign to protect branded terms from competitors.
Test Smart Bidding — 13 conversions/month is low. Use Maximize Clicks to build volume first.
Increase Search Impression Share from 23% — you're missing 77% of potential customers.
